TopicTitle: What do you think about AVG utilities (formerly tuneup utilities)?

Articles.Content: I paid him 140 zÃ…â€š, used before the 10 days trial version installation program, I liked had a lot of useful features, such as "disk space explorer" who showed me which files are taking up the most space, besides, I noticed that your computer runs like a little faster.
Honestly, I feel as if most of these utilities can be found in other programs for free. For example, the "Disk space explorer" can be found in the program WinDirStat. Another good one is CCleaner.
Both of those are great ones, Puzzler. Also defraggler and malwarebytes.
